page.title: 15Tourism-Beamish
page.content: {The Town Area { The major developments at Beamish have recently been centred upon the Town area.Visitors can now walk along cobbled streets and soak in the 'Victorian' atmosphere.Amongst the beautifully recostructed buildings can be found :- a dentist's surgery complete with gruesome implements a solicitor's office a working public house (with beer at modern prices) a grocer's shop,general dealers and restaurant a stables with dray horses and carriages a band stand with regular concerts
